33  package edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.cache;
34  import java.io.File;
35  import java.net.MalformedURLException;
36  import java.net.URL;
37  import java.util.Map;
38  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
39  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
40  
41  import org.apache.commons.lang.StringUtils;
42  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
43  
44  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.cfg.GrouperCacheConfig;
45  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.misc.GrouperVersion;
46  import edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.util.GrouperUtil;
47  import net.sf.ehcache.Cache;
48  import net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager;
49  import net.sf.ehcache.Statistics;
50  import net.sf.ehcache.config.CacheConfiguration;
51  import net.sf.ehcache.config.Configuration;
52  import net.sf.ehcache.config.DiskStoreConfiguration;
53  
54  
55  
56  /**
57   * Base class for common cache operations.
58   * @author  blair christensen.
59   * @version $Id: EhcacheController.java,v 1.13 2009-08-11 20:34:18 mchyzer Exp $
60   * @since   1.2.1
61   */
62  public class EhcacheController implements CacheController {
63  
64    /**
65     * save the config
66     */
67    private Configuration configuration;
68    
69    
70    /**
71     * save the config
72     * @return the configuration
73     */
74    public Configuration getconfiguration() {
75      return this.configuration;
76    }
77  
78    
79    /**
80     * if configured via properties and not ehcache.xml
81     */
82    private boolean configuredViaProperties = false;
83  
84    /**
85     * if configured via properties and not ehcache.xml
86     * @return the configuredViaProperties
87     */
88    public boolean isConfiguredViaProperties() {
89      return this.configuredViaProperties;
90    }
91  
92    /**
93     * singleton cache controller
94     */
95    private static EhcacheController ehcacheController = null;
96  
97    /**
98     * get the mgr
99     * @return the mge
100    */
101   public CacheManager getCacheManager() {
102     return this.mgr;
103   }
104   
105   /**
106    * utility cache controller if you dont want to create your own...
107    * @return ehcache controller
108    */
109   public static EhcacheController ehcacheController() {
110     if (ehcacheController == null) {
111       ehcacheController = new EhcacheController();
112     }
113     return ehcacheController;
114   }
115 
116   /**
117    * manager
118    */
119   private CacheManager mgr;
120 
121   /**
122    * @see java.lang.Object#finalize()
123    */
124   @Override
125   protected void finalize() throws Throwable {
126     super.finalize();
127     this.stop();
128   }
129 
130   /**
131    * @see edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.privs.AccessResolver#stop()
132    */
133   public void stop() {
134     if (this.mgr != null) {
135       synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
136         this.mgr.shutdown();
137       }
138     }
139   }
140 
141  
142   /**
143    * not public since we only want one of these...
144    * Initialize caching.
145    * @since   2.1.0
146    */
147   private EhcacheController() {
148   }
149 
150 
151 
152   /**
153    * Flush all caches.
154    * @since   1.2.1
155    */
156   public void flushCache() {
157     if (this.mgr != null) {
158       this.mgr.clearAll(); // TODO 20070823 how much of a performance hit is calling this method?
159     }
160   }
161 
162   /**
163    * Retrieve a grouper cache (like a generic Map)
164    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
165    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
166    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
167    * @since   1.2.1
168    */
169   public GrouperCache getGrouperCache(String name) 
170     throws  IllegalStateException { 
171     //dont use defaults
172     return getGrouperCache(name, false, -1, false, -1, -1, false);
173   }
174   
175   /**
176    * Retrieve a GrouperCache which is a generic Map cache.  Note the defaults are only used
177    * in the first invocation of the cache retrieval.
178    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
179    * @param useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile use the defaults if not in the config file
180    * @param defaultMaxElementsInMemory if not in config file, this is max elements in memory
181    * @param defaultEternal if not in config file,  true to never expire stuff
182    * @param defaultTimeToIdleSeconds  if not in config file, time where if not accessed, will expire
183    * @param defaultTimeToLiveSeconds  if not in config file, time where even if accessed, will expire
184    * @param defaultOverflowToDisk  if not in config file, if it should go to disk in overflow
185    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
186    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
187    * @since   1.2.1
188    */
189   public GrouperCache getGrouperCache(String name, boolean useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile,
190       int defaultMaxElementsInMemory, 
191       boolean defaultEternal, int defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
192       int defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, boolean defaultOverflowToDisk) 
193     throws  IllegalStateException { 
194     return new GrouperCache(this.getCache(name, useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile, 
195         defaultMaxElementsInMemory, defaultEternal, defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
196         defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, defaultOverflowToDisk));
197   }
198   
199   /**
200    * Note, this might be better to be used from GrouperCache
201    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
202    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
203    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
204    * @since   1.2.1
205    */
206   public Cache getCache(String name) 
207     throws  IllegalStateException { 
208     //dont use defaults
209     return getCache(name, false, -1, false, -1, -1, false);
210   }
211   
212   /**
213    * Note, this might be better to be used from GrouperCache
214    * @param name should be unique, prefix with fully qualified classname
215    * @param useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile use the defaults if not in the config file
216    * @param defaultMaxElementsInMemory if not in config file, this is max elements in memory
217    * @param defaultEternal if not in config file,  true to never expire stuff
218    * @param defaultTimeToIdleSeconds  if not in config file, time where if not accessed, will expire
219    * @param defaultTimeToLiveSeconds  if not in config file, time where even if accessed, will expire
220    * @param defaultOverflowToDisk  if not in config file, if it should go to disk in overflow
221    * @return  Cache <i>name</i>.
222    * @throws  IllegalStateException if cache not found.
223    * @since   1.2.1
224    */
225   public Cache getCache(String name, boolean useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile,
226       int defaultMaxElementsInMemory, 
227       boolean defaultEternal, int defaultTimeToIdleSeconds, 
228       int defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, boolean defaultOverflowToDisk) 
229     throws  IllegalStateException { 
230     
231     this.initialize();
232     if (this.mgr.cacheExists(name) ) {
233       Cache cache = this.mgr.getCache(name);
234       return cache;
235 
236     }
237     if (useDefaultIfNotInConfigFile) {
238       if (LOG != null) {
239         LOG.info("cache not configured explicitly: " + name + ", to override default values, " +
240         		"configure in the resource /grouper.cache.base.properties and /grouper.cache.properties.  Default values are:" +
241         		"maxElementsInMemory: " + defaultMaxElementsInMemory + ", eternal: " + defaultEternal
242         		+ ", timeToIdleSeconds: " + defaultTimeToIdleSeconds + ", timeToLiveSeconds: " 
243         		+ defaultTimeToLiveSeconds + ", overFlowToDisk: " + defaultOverflowToDisk);
244       }
245       Cache cache = new Cache(name, defaultMaxElementsInMemory, defaultOverflowToDisk, 
246           defaultEternal, defaultTimeToLiveSeconds, defaultTimeToIdleSeconds);
247       //TODO CH 20081118, see if cache by name there already...
248       this.mgr.addCache(cache);
249       return cache;
250     }
251     
252     throw new IllegalStateException("cache not found: " + name + " make sure the cache" +
253         " config is correct, the resource: /grouper.cache.base.properties and /grouper.cache.properties");
254   }
255 
256   /** logger */
257   private static final Log LOG = GrouperUtil.getLog(EhcacheController.class);
258 
259   /**
260    * @param cache 
261    * @return  ehcache statistics for <i>cache</i>.
262    * @since   1.2.1
263    */
264   public CacheStats getStats(String cache) {
265     //not sure if we need to initialize, since no stats will be found...
266     this.initialize();
267     Cache c = this.getCache(cache);
268     c.setStatisticsAccuracy(Statistics.STATISTICS_ACCURACY_GUARANTEED);
269     return new EhcacheStats( c.getStatistics() );
270   }
271 
272   /** 
273    * Initialize privilege cache.
274    * @since   1.2.1
275    */
276   public void initialize() {
277     if (this.mgr == null) {
278       synchronized(EhcacheController.class) {
279         if (this.mgr == null) {
280 
281           URL grouperCachePropertiesUrl = this.getClass().getResource("/grouper.cache.properties");
282           URL ehcacheUrl = null;
283           boolean ehcacheXmlEligible = !GrouperVersion.valueOfIgnoreCase("2.3.1").greaterOrEqualToArg(GrouperVersion.currentVersion());
284           if (!ehcacheXmlEligible) {
285             ehcacheUrl = null;
286           } else {
287             ehcacheUrl = this.getClass().getResource("/ehcache.xml");
288             if (ehcacheUrl != null) {
289               LOG.error("ERROR: You have an ehache.xml on the classpath, "
290                   + "you must convert the ehcache.xml file to grouper.cache.properties and remove it.");
291             }
292             ehcacheUrl = null;
293           }
294 
295           //trying to avoid warning of using the same dir
296           String tmpDir = GrouperUtil.tmpDir();
297           try {
298             String newTmpdir = StringUtils.trimToEmpty(tmpDir);
299             if (!newTmpdir.endsWith("\\") && !newTmpdir.endsWith("/")) {
300               newTmpdir += File.separator;
301             }
302             newTmpdir += "grouper_ehcache_auto_" + GrouperUtil.uniqueId();
303             System.setProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR, newTmpdir);
304           
305             synchronized(CacheManager.class) {
306 
307               if (grouperCachePropertiesUrl != null && ehcacheUrl != null) {
308                 if (ehcacheXmlEligible) {
309                   LOG.error("ERROR: You have an ehache.xml and grouper.cache.properties on the classpath, "
310                     + "you should only have one or the other.  "
311                     + "You should probably delete the ehcache.xml file.");
312                 } else {
313                   LOG.error("ERROR: You have an ehache.xml on the classpath, "
314                       + "you should the ehcache.xml file.");
315                 }
316               }
317 
318               boolean configured = false;
319               
320 //              //if no grouper.cache.properties url, and an ehcache.xml, then use that
321 //              if (ehcacheXmlEligible && grouperCachePropertiesUrl == null && ehcacheUrl != null) {
322 //                LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with ehcache.xml");
323 //                //now it should be using a unique directory
324 //                this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheUrl);
325 //
326 //                configured = true;
327 //              }
328               
329               GrouperCacheConfig grouperCacheConfig = configured ? null : GrouperCacheConfig.retrieveConfig();
330 //              if (!configured) {
331 //
332 //                //use config file?
333 //                String ehcacheXmlFile = grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueString("grouper.cache.ehcache.xml.filename");
334 //                
335 //                if (!StringUtils.isBlank(ehcacheXmlFile)) {
336 //                  LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with xml file configured in grouper.cache.properties: " + ehcacheXmlFile);
337 //                  try {
338 //                    ehcacheUrl = new File(ehcacheXmlFile).toURI().toURL();
339 //                  } catch (MalformedURLException mue) {
340 //                    throw new RuntimeException(mue);
341 //                  }
342 //                  this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheUrl);
343 //                  configured = true;
344 //                }
345 //              }
346 //              if (!configured) {
347 //
348 //                //use config file?
349 //                String ehcacheXmlResource = grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueString("grouper.cache.ehcache.xml.resource");
350 //                
351 //                if (!StringUtils.isBlank(ehcacheXmlResource)) {
352 //                  LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with xml resource configured in grouper.cache.properties: " + ehcacheXmlResource);
353 //                  ehcacheUrl = this.getClass().getResource(ehcacheXmlResource);
354 //                  this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheUrl);
355 //                  configured = true;
356 //                }
357 //              }
358 
359               if (!configured) {
360                 this.configuredViaProperties = true;
361                 LOG.debug("Configuring ehcache with grouper.cache.properties");
362                 
363                 
364                 
365                 Configuration ehcacheConfiguration = new Configuration();
366                 
367                 //disk store
368                 {
369                   DiskStoreConfiguration diskStoreConfiguration = new DiskStoreConfiguration();
370                   diskStoreConfiguration.setPath(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueStringRequired("grouper.cache.diskStorePath"));
371                   ehcacheConfiguration.addDiskStore(diskStoreConfiguration);
372                 }
373 
374                 {
375                   //default cache
376                   CacheConfiguration defaultCache = new CacheConfiguration();
377                   assignCacheFromProperties(grouperCacheConfig, defaultCache, "cache.defaultCache");
378                   ehcacheConfiguration.addDefaultCache(defaultCache);
379                 }
380                 
381                 //set all caches
382                 Pattern ehcachePattern = Pattern.compile("^(cache\\.name\\.[^.]+)\\.name$");
383                 Map<String, String> cacheNameMap = grouperCacheConfig.propertiesMap(ehcachePattern);
384                 for (String propertyKey : cacheNameMap.keySet()) {
385                   Matcher matcher = ehcachePattern.matcher(propertyKey);
386                   matcher.matches();
387                   String configPrefix = matcher.group(1);
388                   CacheConfiguration cacheConfiguration = new CacheConfiguration();
389                   assignCacheFromProperties(grouperCacheConfig, cacheConfiguration, configPrefix);
390                   ehcacheConfiguration.addCache(cacheConfiguration);
391                 }
392 
393                 this.configuration = ehcacheConfiguration;
394                 this.mgr = new CacheManager(ehcacheConfiguration);
395                 
396                 configured = true;
397 
398               }
399               if (!configured) {
400                 throw new RuntimeException("ehcache is not configured, do you have a "
401                     + "grouper.cache.properties and grouper.cache.base.properties on your classpath?");
402               }
403             }
404           } finally {
405             
406             //put tmpdir back
407             if (tmpDir == null) {
408               System.clearProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR);
409             } else {
410               System.setProperty(GrouperUtil.JAVA_IO_TMPDIR, tmpDir);
411             }
412           }
413         }
414       }
415     }
416   }
417 
418   /**
419    * assign cache from properties
420    * @param grouperCacheConfig 
421    * @param cacheConfiguration
422    * @param propertyPrefix
423    */
424   private static void assignCacheFromProperties(GrouperCacheConfig grouperCacheConfig, CacheConfiguration cacheConfiguration, String propertyPrefix) {
425     //  cache.defaultCache.maxElementsInMemory = 1000
426     //  cache.defaultCache.eternal = 1000
427     //  cache.defaultCache.timeToIdleSeconds = 1000
428     //  cache.defaultCache.timeToLiveSeconds = 1000
429     //  cache.defaultCache.overflowToDisk = false
430     //  cache.defaultCache.statistics = false
431     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".name")) {
432       cacheConfiguration.setName(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueStringRequired(propertyPrefix + ".name"));
433     }
434     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".maxElementsInMemory")) {
435       cacheConfiguration.setMaxElementsInMemory(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueInt(propertyPrefix + ".maxElementsInMemory"));
436     }
437     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".eternal")) {
438       cacheConfiguration.setEternal(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueBooleanRequired(propertyPrefix + ".eternal"));
439     }
440     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".timeToIdleSeconds")) {
441       cacheConfiguration.setTimeToIdleSeconds(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueInt(propertyPrefix + ".timeToIdleSeconds"));
442     }
443     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".timeToLiveSeconds")) {
444       cacheConfiguration.setTimeToLiveSeconds(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueInt(propertyPrefix + ".timeToLiveSeconds"));
445     }
446     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".overflowToDisk")) {
447       cacheConfiguration.setOverflowToDisk(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueBooleanRequired(propertyPrefix + ".overflowToDisk"));
448     }
449     if (grouperCacheConfig.containsKey(propertyPrefix + ".statistics")) {
450       cacheConfiguration.setStatistics(grouperCacheConfig.propertyValueBooleanRequired(propertyPrefix + ".statistics"));
451     }
452 
453   }
454   
455 }
